page.title: 18THE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a very small rural one, it has got 96 pupils in three classes.It has a large field and quite a small playground. The school is new, it was rebuilt last year and we have only been in here one year.Two of the classrooms were built in 1860 but the rest of the school was built from new. Our school has got a red high pitched roof and orange bricks. There is a large library,or information centre and the computer is kept in there as well. Our school is very modern, with lots of new equipment. In the hall through the window you can see sheep and horses grazing on farmer Jones' fields. Most of the children come to school on the school bus or by car because the school serves a very large rural area.
